headline.main: L0CATELLI IS DEAD;l ENVOY CARDINAL, 79; Diplomat in Vatican Service Almost 40 Year's Had Acted for Pope in 9 Countries,

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 5. -- A further absorption of the unemployed in Italy through extension of the forty-hour week, bringing the number of jobless to a level slightly lower than last year, and some improvement in wholesale trade in that country were...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 5. -- A further absorption of the unemployed in Italy through extension of the forty-hour week, bringing the number of jobless to a level slightly lower than last year, and some improvement in wholesale trade in that country were reported today by the Commerce Department's weekly survey of business abroad.

headline.main: BUSINESS IN ITALY SHOWS SOME GAINS; Labor Bureau Survey Finds Fewer Idle Than Last Year With Industries Speeded Up.

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: OVER the Chaco forest the airplane roared, a tiny oasis of noise in a wilderness of silence. Looking down from height of 6,000 feet, one saw stretching to the horizon an unbroken mass of forest, not green and luscious as a tropical forest ought to...
docs.lead_paragraph: OVER the Chaco forest the airplane roared, a tiny oasis of noise in a wilderness of silence. Looking down from height of 6,000 feet, one saw stretching to the horizon an unbroken mass of forest, not green and luscious as a tropical forest ought to be, but gray, monotonous, almost colorless.

headline.main: WAR IN THE CHACO'S 'GRAY HELL'; Between the Forces of Bolivia and Paraguay the Death Struggle Still Goes On Relentlessly in a Land Where Thirst Tortures the Soldiers on Either Side

docs.snippet: The stress of political and financial uncertainties in Europe played havoc with the gold currencies in the exchange market last week. Except for the English pound, which profited by the flight of capital from the Continent, there was severe...
docs.lead_paragraph: The stress of political and financial uncertainties in Europe played havoc with the gold currencies in the exchange market last week. Except for the English pound, which profited by the flight of capital from the Continent, there was severe depreciation in the Holland, Swiss and Belgium currencies.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED APRIL 6, 1935.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 8. -- Although the foreign trade of the United States increased in February, as compared with a year ago, business with Europe declined both in exports and imports, the Commerce Department showed today in a monthly analysis.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 8. -- Although the foreign trade of the United States increased in February, as compared with a year ago, business with Europe declined both in exports and imports, the Commerce Department showed today in a monthly analysis.

headline.main: TRADEWITH EUROPE FELL IN FEBRUARY; Imports Dropped to $40,345,18, as Against $48,319,299 In Same Month of 1934.

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
